cohort.description: Space travel is intrinsically blasphemous. Space nations are the embodiment of hubris and not countenanced.
Space travel confined to the solar system is okay but it is blasphemous to go beyond. The space nations are barely tolerated.
The Veil's protection endures because it is revered. Going beyond the Veil invites damnation.
The Veil is a product of benevolent alien design. The aliens will lower the Veil and bring humanity into the fold when they are ready.
Their sacred duty is to pierce behind the Veil and make contact with alien life. They are seen as apostates by other sects.
The garden is only as good as the gardener. They believe they must cultivate personal growth to be stewards of life.
Uplift other species on Earth to share the responsibility of nurturing life.
To achieve an age of harmony, competition must be pruned, root and stem.
The Big Bang was the Sacred Singularity. Spread the will of God through the galaxy or time will flow backward towards the Sacred Singularity to begin anew.
Believe they are moving through time towards the center of the Sacred Singularity. They seek to birth God, a perfected true Artificial General Intelligence.
A religion of peace. Coexist with others and make the best of time on the planet.
People and science are corrupting their Goddess, the Matron planet. Science, pollution, and other enemies of the Goddess must burn.
